name: Mother Says
description: In a universe opposite of our own, a life form is born. This life form is given five days to develop a personality, and at the end of those five days they will be given a name by the God-like entity known as Mother. The name given to them will define their future, and dictate how the rest of their life will live out. Follow the newborn 568365 as they discover who they are, as well as the strange universe they have been born in.
